title: Complementary font?
content:
So I gotta do this brochure thing for a friend whose a photographer  
Im using American typewriter light for her name/logo,  
Any suggestions as to what font would compliment it in the main body of text?

Logo is in the attachment...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141026054814im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_5627.png)
author: eoc

comments.content:
\*points to current featured font\*

Peace,  
JT
what? dont have a clue what that comment meant..

I think he meant FF Netto, the current typeface used in the headlines.

David

Oh ok thanks!  
eh yeah...maybe...Ill try it out!
Maybe a warm sans like Charlotte Sans Book.
